description.name: Water pump with copper wire with float
description.long_desc:
á

Sewage pump WQCD 0,75 (cooper wire).

The pump is equipped with a copper wire and a float turning the pump off when the water level is maximum.

TECHNICAL DATA

Power supply 230 V / 50 Hz
Power 750W
Max. performance 20 000 l/h
Max. height of water column 20m
Max. immersion depth 8m
Hose diameter 2" = 50mm
Certificates CE

description.name: WQD pump with float switch and thermal switch
description.long_desc:
Septic water pump WQD-nickel áfloat+thermal switch

á

Efficient WQD pump with a shredderácan be used in households and farmsteads for emptying septic tanks outá, pumping out water from flooded rooms, etc Maximum efficiency of the pump isá17 000 l per hour.áá

The pump is equipped with aá3-vaneáshredder, which is perfect for impurities of maximum 4-mm diameter.áá

The float reduces the risk of overheating while pump is running dry.

A given products is made of top quality materials. Nickelábody guarantees long life of the pump.

á

TECHNICAL DATA:

Power: 550W

Power supplyá230V/ 50Hz

Maximum efficiencyá17000l/H

Hose diameterá2''=52mm

Maximum height of pumping waterá8m

á

description.name: WQD pump with float switch and thermal switch
description.long_desc:
Sceptic water pump WQD-shredder float+thermal switch

á

Efficient pump with a shredderáWQD, float and thermal switcháof sewage pump series suitable for:

  • pumping rain water, seepage water and household waste-water
  • emergency drainage ofáflooded areas
  • pouring clean or moderately dirty water, but with no stones or similar things.

By means of totally or partially submerged pump. The maximum pump capacity is 17 000 liters per hour.

The pump is equipped with aá3-vaneáshredder, which is perfect for impurities of maximum 4-mm diameter.áá

Thermal switchá-áturns the pump off protecting it against overheating which leads to "burning" of winding. Pump will turn on automatically, when the temperature is lower than the safe one.ááGeater reliability and safetyá!

A given products is made of top quality materials. Iron cast body guarantees long life of the pump.á

TECHNICAL DATA:

Power supply: 230 V/ 50 Hz

Power: 550W
Maximum efficiency: 17000 l/h
Hose length: ok. 8m
Hose diameter: 2" = 52mm
Float switching off by the minimum water level
Maximum height of pumping water: 8m
Maximum diameter of impuritiesá: 4mm
Material:ácast iron
Thermal switch
CE CERTIFICATE

á

Garden water pumpá1200W

á

Garden water pump is designed forávarious types of garden works for which water should be used.áá

The pump is perfect for watering gardens, pumping in and out rainwater and water from swimming pools.á

á

Power: 1200W

Dane techniczne

  • Moc: 1,5 KM
  • Pojemność skokowa: 25,4 cm3
  • Typ zasialnia: spalinowa
  • Typ świecy zapłonowej: L7T
  • Typ silnika: dwusuwowy, chłodzony powietrzem
  • Typ filtra powietrza: siatkowy

  • Pojemność zbiornika oleju: 160 ml
  • Proporcja mieszanki paliwo/olej: 1:25
  • Długość prowadnicy: 10" / 25 cm
  • Ilość ogniw łańcucha: 40
  • Podziałka gwintu na wlocie: 3/8"
  • Szerokość rowka: 1,3 mm (0.50")
  • System antywibracyjny: tak

Oil GEKO designed to be used in two-stroke engines, for petroil and individual lubrication.

Typical dosing to 1:50 (2% oil in fuel) or higher if recommended by a producer.

category.name: Service Equipment
category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Service Equipment

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Service Equipment

description.name: High Temperature Silicone Sealant 40g (red)
description.long_desc:
Perfect replacement for car's gaskets and agricultural tractors. Suitable for sealing engines and gearboxes, drive axles and exhaust systems. High Temperature Silocone guarantees a fast and flexible connection resistant to changing weather conditions, water, gasoline, alkalis, acids and oils.


Technical Data



  • Excellent temperature resistance: form -60°C to 350°C

  • Red colour – for easy installation identification

  • Excellent adhesion to non-porous surfaces


Limitations



  • Do not use on porous surfaces such as brick, concrete and stone.

  • Do not use in conjunction with bitumen, lead or Asphalt.

  • Not for use on substrates that may bleed oils, solvent or plasticisers.

  • Do not use on soft metals such as lead or brass.

  • On temperatures above 285°C, slight discolouration may occur, but the joint will maintain its integrity.

  • Do not use above 350°C
description.short_desc:
Perfect replacement for car's gaskets and agricultural tractors. Suitable for sealing engines and gearboxes, drive axles and exhaust systems. High Temperature Silocone guarantees a fast and flexible connection resistant to changing weather conditions, water, gasoline, alkalis, acids and oils.


Technical Data



  • Excellent temperature resistance: form -60°C to 350°C

  • Red colour – for easy installation identification

  • Excellent adhesion to non-porous surfaces


Limitations



  • Do not use on porous surfaces such as brick, concrete and stone.

  • Do not use in conjunction with bitumen, lead or Asphalt.

  • Not for use on substrates that may bleed oils, solvent or plasticisers.

  • Do not use on soft metals such as lead or brass.

  • On temperatures above 285°C, slight discolouration may occur, but the joint will maintain its integrity.

  • Do not use above 350°C

  • Excellent temperature resistance: form -60°C to 350°C

  • Red colour – for easy installation identification

  • Excellent adhesion to non-porous surfaces


Limitations



  • Do not use on porous surfaces such as brick, concrete and stone.

  • Do not use in conjunction with bitumen, lead or Asphalt.

  • Not for use on substrates that may bleed oils, solvent or plasticisers.

  • Do not use on soft metals such as lead or brass.

  • On temperatures above 285°C, slight discolouration may occur, but the joint will maintain its integrity.

  • Do not use above 350°C

category.name: Service Equipment
category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Service Equipment

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Service Equipment

description.name: High Temperature Silicone Sealant 300ml
description.long_desc:
Perfect replacement for car's gaskets and agricultural tractors. Suitable for sealing engines and gearboxes, drive axles and exhaust systems. High Temperature Silocone guarantees a fast and flexible connection resistant to changing weather conditions, water, gasoline, alkalis, acids and oils.


Technical Data



  • Excellent temperature resistance: form -60°C to 350°C

  • Red colour – for easy installation identification

  • Excellent adhesion to non-porous surfaces

  • Volume: 300 ml


Limitations



  • Do not use on porous surfaces such as brick, concrete and stone.

  • Do not use in conjunction with bitumen, lead or Asphalt.

  • Not for use on substrates that may bleed oils, solvent or plasticisers.

  • Do not use on soft metals such as lead or brass.

  • On temperatures above 285°C, slight discolouration may occur, but the joint will maintain its integrity.

  • Do not use above 350°C

description.name: Welding Spray 400ml GEKO
description.long_desc:
Spray spawalniczy

Preparat antyodpryskowy to specjalistyczny, bezsilikonowy środek przeznaczony do zabezpieczania powierzchni przed odpryskami w trakcie spawania metali. Posiada własności antyadhezyjne dzięki czemu odpryski rozgrzanych części metalowych nie przylegają do powierzchni metalu spawanego pozostawiając spoinę czystą, o gładkiej powierzchni otaczającej spaw.

Charakterystyka produktu

  • redukuje przyleganie odprysków metalu
  • lepsza efektywność spawania
  • nie zawiera silikonu

Zastosowanie

Ochrony dyszy palnika, narzędzi i powierzchni materiału spawanego przed wtapianiem się odprysków metalu podczas spawania metodą MIG/MAG.

description.name: Electric tiller 45vm 6 blades
description.long_desc:
Electric tiller - cultivator 32cm

á

Electric tiller-cultivator may be used in every home garden and a plot with an electricty access.áá

GElectric tiller - cultivator is an irreplaceable devide for scarifying and evening large areas of soil in the garden, especially this hard and cleyey. It is usually used in planning your new garden or making a lawn.

á

Technical data:

Voltage: 230V~50Hz

Widthá32cm

á

description.name: Electric Hedge trimmer 500W 450mm
description.long_desc:
Electric hedgeátrimmer 500W 450mm JG

á

Trimmers perfect for cutting low and medium-height hedges. The engine power has been matched to the length of the guide.ááLight and ergonomic design guaranteesáhigh and comfortable performance.á

á

Voltage: 230V~50Hz
Power: 500W
Cutting lenth: 450mm

category.name: Cordless Grass and Shrub Shears
category.path: Garden\Trimming and Cutting\Cordless Grass and Shrub Shears

category_idosell.path: Garden\Trimming and Cutting\Cordless Grass and Shrub Shears

description.name: Grass trimmer 3.6V 120mm
description.long_desc:
Cordless grass/shrub shears 3.6V 120mm

á

Cordless grass/shrub shears are irreplaceable device during garden maintenance. áFinishing the grass edges has never been easier. Because of usage of lithium-ionábatteryáwithá1300mAh capacity the shears become very handy and the cable does not bother the user. The ergonimic handle is covered by a anti-slip material and because of low weight makes the performance comfortable and safe.á

The set includes wide blade for cutting 83mm wide grassáand blade for cutting 120 mm long shears. The blade is changed with no use of tools, what enbles to change the blades for grass into the blades for shears. Usage of two blades enable to form the lawn and small shears very precisely.

The battery enables to perform long with no need to load often.áThe charging status is displayed by a diode.

Technical data:

Battery type: Li-Ion
Battery voltageá3.6V
Battery capacityá1,2Ah
Loading timeá(empty battery)á3-5h
Hedge cutting: cutting lengthá120mm
Hedge cutting: cutting widthá6mm
Cutting grass: cutting widthá83mm

á



á

á

description.name: Electric brush cutter
description.long_desc:
Electric brush cutteráJG PROFI

á

Electric brush cutter of GEKO brand is a high quality device for garden maintenance. Perfect for cutting and shaping the ednges of a lawn. Driven by a powerful and durable motor.


Revolutional design enables to adjust the device to your own preferences and performance in poorly accessible areas.ááThe telescopic regulation enables to adjust the device to the height of the user.á

The brush cutter can be used near wallsábecause of a cutting system protection. The additional advantage isfast replacement spool system.á

This all makes the device perfect for cutting the mown edges and performance in areas poorly accessible for a typical brush cutter. á

á

Technical data:

Voltage: 230V, 50Hz
Power: 500W
Max cutting width: 300mm
Maximum torque with no load: 10000 min-1





á
description.short_desc:
Electric brush cutteráJG PROFI

á

Electric brush cutter of GEKO brand is a high quality device for garden maintenance. Perfect for cutting and shaping the ednges of a lawn. Driven by a powerful and durable motor.

á

Technical data:

Voltage: 230V, 50Hz
Power: 500W
Max cutting width: 300mm
Maximum torque with no load: 10000 min-1





á

description.name: Lawn Mower with Metal Cover 40cm JG
description.long_desc:
```html

Reliable 139cc engine with a nominal power of 2.7 kW.

All mower components are made from the highest quality materials.

The compact design and lightweight construction make this mower perfect for small plots or gardens.

The mower housing is made of high-quality metal.

An additional advantage of the John Gardener TB40P11 mower is the 3-step cutting height adjustment.



Product Features:



  • Powerful 4-stroke engine with a 139cc capacity and a nominal power of 2.7 kW

  • 40 cm cutting width

  • 40-liter grass collection bag

  • 3-step cutting height adjustment

  • Solid, lightweight construction

  • Fully foldable handle

  • Rear discharge cover made of high-quality plastic

  • Handle coated with soft foam to reduce vibrations and ensure maximum mowing comfort



Technical Specifications:



  • Nominal power: 2.7 kW

  • Engine type: OHV 4-stroke

  • Engine capacity: 139 cc

  • Self-propelled: No

  • Starting system: Manual

  • Cutting width: 400 mm

  • Cutting height: 20 - 60 mm

  • Height adjustment: Manual, 3-step

  • Discharge type: Rear

  • Grass mulching: No

  • Grass collector capacity: 40 liters

  • Wheel size (front/rear): 150 mm / 150 mm

  • Height with handle: 107 cm

  • Width: 45 cm

  • Length: 124 cm

  • Length when folded: 94 cm

  • Height when folded: 63 cm







Check the device test on our YouTube channel:



```
